languages.text: "Каждый Версериан положил жизнь на служение династии фон Валанциус. Мы не предаем наши идеалы".

traits.locale_text: "Каждый Версериан положил жизнь на служение династии фон Валанциус. Мы не предаем наши идеалы".

languages.text: "Every Werserian has dedicated their life to serving the von Valancius dynasty. We do not betray our ideals."
languages.original_text: "Каждый Версериан положил жизнь на служение династии фон Валанциус. Мы не предаем наши идеалы".

traits.locale_text: "Each Werserian has put their life to serve the von Valancius dynasty. We do not betray our ideals."
"Each Werserian has put their life to serve the von Valancius dynasty. We do not betray our ideals."
"Each Werserian has dedicated themselves to serving the von Valancius dynasty. We do not betray our ideals."
"Each Werserian has dedicated themselves to serving the von Valancius dynasty. We do not betray our ideals."
"Every Werserian has dedicated their life to serving the von Valancius dynasty. We do not betray our ideals."
"Every Werserian has dedicated their life to serving the von Valancius dynasty. We do not betray our ideals."

languages.text: 「すべてのウェルザリアン家の一員は献身的にフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝に仕えてきました。己の理想を自ら裏切りはしません」
languages.original_text: "Every Werserian has dedicated their life to serving the von Valancius dynasty. We do not betray our ideals."

traits.locale_text: 「すべてのウェルザリアン家の一員は献身的にフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝に仕えてきました。己の理想を自ら裏切りはしません」

languages.text: “韦尔森家族的每个人都为冯·瓦兰修斯王朝鞠躬尽瘁、死而后已。我们绝不可能背叛我们的理想。”
languages.original_text: "Every Werserian has dedicated their life to serving the von Valancius dynasty. We do not betray our ideals."

traits.locale_text: “韦尔森家族的每个人都为冯·瓦兰修斯王朝鞠躬尽瘁、死而后已。我们绝不可能背叛我们的理想。”

languages.text: « Tous les Werserian sont entièrement dévoués à la dynastie von Valancius. Jamais nous ne trahissons nos idéaux. »
languages.original_text: "Every Werserian has dedicated their life to serving the von Valancius dynasty. We do not betray our ideals."

traits.locale_text: « Tous les Werserian sont entièrement dévoués à la dynastie von Valancius. Jamais nous ne trahissons nos idéaux. »

languages.text: «Todos y cada uno de los Werserian ha dedicado su vida a servir a la dinastía von Valancius. No traicionamos nuestros ideales».
languages.original_text: "Every Werserian has dedicated their life to serving the von Valancius dynasty. We do not betray our ideals."

traits.locale_text: «Todos y cada uno de los Werserian ha dedicado su vida a servir a la dinastía von Valancius. No traicionamos nuestros ideales».

languages.text: "Jeder Werserian hat sein Leben der Aufgabe verschrieben, der Valancius-Dynastie zu dienen. Wir verraten unsere Ideale nicht."
languages.original_text: "Every Werserian has dedicated their life to serving the von Valancius dynasty. We do not betray our ideals."

traits.locale_text: "Jeder Werserian hat sich der Aufgabe verschrieben, der Valancius-Dynastie zu dienen. Wir verraten unsere Ideale nicht."

languages.text: "Werserian Hanesi'nin her bir mensubu, ömrünü von Valancius hanedanlığına hizmete adamıştır. Biz, ilkelerimize sırt çevirmeyiz."
languages.original_text: "Every Werserian has dedicated their life to serving the von Valancius dynasty. We do not betray our ideals."

traits.locale_text: "Werserian Hanesinin her mensubu ömrünü von Valancius hanedanlığına hizmete adamıştır. Biz, ilkelerimize sırt çevirmeyiz."
